content:
## n8n@0.222.0 View the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.221.2...n8n@0.222.0) for this version.
**Release date:** 2023-03-30 This release contains new features, including custom filters for the executions list, and a new node to filter items in your workflows. /// note | Upgrade to 0.222.1 Upgrade directly to 0.222.1. ///
